Articles.Content:
Hello, Friend recommend to me a linux lite, so i tried it.

well, when i tried RP1 on it, it was really laggy and some mods dosen't works(i know now just about Kopernicus)

when i tried to fix it i just found that same problem will be probably without mods

any tips how i can make it work?

PC specs: 

CPU: AMD Phenom II X6 1055

GPU: AMD Radeon HD 6670 

RAM: 12GB
